tasks.title: Implement Navigation and Routing System
tasks.description: Set up the app's navigation structure with routing between all main screens
tasks.details:
Implement a navigation system using Flutter's Navigator 2.0 or GoRouter for declarative routing. Create a route configuration that includes the following screens:
1. Invitation display screen (home)
2. Photo gallery
3. Location/maps
4. Guest messages
5. Sharing options
6. Editor system (for Phase 2)

Implement transitions between screens with smooth animations following Material Design guidelines. Set up deep linking support for direct navigation to specific screens.

Example routing setup with GoRouter:
```dart
final router = GoRouter(
  routes: [
    GoRoute(
      path: '/',
      builder: (context, state) => InvitationScreen(),
    ),
    GoRoute(
      path: '/gallery',
      builder: (context, state) => GalleryScreen(),
    ),
    GoRoute(
      path: '/location',
      builder: (context, state) => LocationScreen(),
    ),
    // Additional routes
  ],
);
```

Ensure the navigation system supports the key user flows outlined in the PRD.

tasks.title: Develop Multi-Provider Map Widgets with Location Search and Save
tasks.description: Create three map widgets (Google, Kakao, Naver) with unified and individual app modes, supporting location search and the ability to save locations.
tasks.details: Implement three distinct map widgets for Google Maps, Kakao Maps, and Naver Maps, each supporting location search and location saving. Architect the solution to allow both a combined app (where users can switch between providers) and standalone apps for each provider. For each map provider, integrate their respective Flutter SDKs or web views as appropriate. Implement a unified interface for location search, utilizing each provider's geocoding API (e.g., Google Maps Geocoding, Kakao Local API, Naver Map Geocoding).
